CodeList.Name: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Are you currently employed (working for pay)?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WPAI01-Missed Work Hours Due to Problem
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of problems associated with your problem?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Missed Work Hours Due to Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WPAI01-Missed Work Hours Due to Other
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of any other reason, such as vacation, holidays, time off to participate in this study?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Missed Work Hours Due to Other Reasons

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your problem affect your productivity while you were working?

Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your problem affect your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Problem Affects Regular Daily Activity

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WPAI:SHP v2.0 Test Code Terminology
